code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MyTickets=()=>{const[tickets,setTickets]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchTickets=async()=>{try{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');const res=await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/tickets/my-tickets',{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}});setTickets(res.data);}catch(err){console.error('Error fetching tickets:',err);}};fetchTickets();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"My Tickets"}),tickets.length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:tickets.map(ticket=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:ticket.eventName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Quantity: ",ticket.quantity]})]},ticket.id))}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No tickets found."})]});};export default MyTickets;
